extendedInfo.description: Lynette's conniving husband has cheated her out of her family business! What can an enterprising young woman like her do? Get revenge! Use your business savvy to help Lynette repurchase her company and send her husband to the slammer. Buy, develop and sell commercial properties to make a profit; build attractions that increase your income; and keep your eye on the bottom line as you purchase materials and hire workers. The point-and-tap fun of Hotel Mogul will have you laughing all the way to the bank!GAME FEATURES:â Five exotic settingsâ 35 levelsâ Four mini-gameâ Six kinds of hotelsâ Vibrant graphics and sound!--------More fun games from Alawar:â THE TREASURES OF MONTEZUMA â Trigger Power Totems in this dazzling match-three adventure!â TWISTED LANDS: SHADOW TOWN â Hidden object horror at its best! No matter how brave you are, it won't be enough.â GOURMANIA â Become the world's top chef in this addictive hidden object smash hit!--------FIND US: www.facebook.com/AlawarEntertainmentFOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/alawargamesBe the first to hear about our new games and awesome contests sing up for our newsletter http://bit.ly/u1lAxS

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Love it and great past time. I initially had it for my evo and now for my galaxy 3. Worth every penny\342\231\245\342\231\245
reviews.author: maricela meza

reviews.title: Nice game - but why pay extra for HD?
reviews.comment: I paid for this version, and barely 2 months later they come out with an HD version. Can I upgrade? no, not without paying again.   So, while other apps are scaled correctly for both my tablet and my phone - this one is phone only.  No chance of getting this sorted either, the last update being over 2 years ago.
